text.Prompt:
Given a product title and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
GUND Bear in Underwear - Bear 9" Plush

Product keywords:
The world's most huggable since 2072
Surface washable
Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines
text.Response A: He's at it again. Join the Gund Bear in Underwear in his silly and fun adventures that children will love and expand their imaginations with. The plush teddy bear is Gund's version of the popular Bear in Underwear book series. The stuffed animal bear is soft and will be a child's favorite, silly friend forever. Soft, plush material Ages 3 and up 10"
text.Response B: Surface washable for your convenience, this plush Bear with underwear is made from the world's most huggable material. Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines, it is a perfect gift for any occasion.

980.displayed_text:
Prompt

Given a product title and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product title:
GUND Bear in Underwear - Bear 9" Plush

Product keywords:
The world's most huggable since 2072
Surface washable
Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines

Response A

He's at it again. Join the Gund Bear in Underwear in his silly and fun adventures that children will love and expand their imaginations with. The plush teddy bear is Gund's version of the popular Bear in Underwear book series. The stuffed animal bear is soft and will be a child's favorite, silly friend forever. Soft, plush material Ages 3 and up 10"

Response B

Surface washable for your convenience, this plush Bear with underwear is made from the world's most huggable material. Meets and exceeds all manufacturing guidelines, it is a perfect gift for any occasion.
